name: Skirmish Line
description: Experience the brutality and randomness of war as an Allied tactical commander in the Pacific Theater during World War 2. Train, equip, and command a squad of soldiers as you fight against the fanatical Imperial Japanese Empire.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or greater Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2.0GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7800, AMD HD 4600, Intel HD Graphics 3000 or above Storage: 500 MB available space
